data: The thread "Project kickoff meeting" discusses scheduling the project kickoff meeting next week.
The thread "Project kickoff meeting" aims to confirm availability for a meeting on Tuesday or Wednesday.
The thread "Project kickoff meeting" indicates that the client agrees to a Tuesday 2 PM meeting time.

The thread "Project kickoff meeting" intends to discuss project scope and agree on the project timeline.
The thread "Project kickoff meeting" outlines follow-up actions to set up additional meetings and assign project tasks.
